document.full_text: canada can't keep spending on healthcare at its current rate, and must choose between a number of unpopular options for its state-funded medical system, a former central bank chief said on wednesday.
document.title: ex-central banker warns on canada health spending
lines_and_colors: canada can't keep spending on healthcare at its current rate, and must choose between a number of unpopular options for its state-funded medical system, a former central bank chief said on wednesday.
